[DQC.US.0082.9295] The filer has used the element VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedLiabilitiesCurrent to report a value of 334,000,000 in the filing. The filer should use the element LiabilitiesCurrent with the axis ConsolidatedEntitiesAxis and the member VariableInterestEntityPrimaryBeneficiaryMember to indicate the portion of the balance sheet category that is applicable to consolidated VIE's.
The properties of this VariableInterestEntityConsolidatedLiabilitiesCurrent fact are: Period :2018-12-31 Dimensions : us-gaap:VariableInterestEntitiesByClassificationOfEntityAxis=us-gaap:VariableInterestEntityPrimaryBeneficiaryMember, us-gaap:BalanceSheetLocationAxis=dwdp:CurrentLiabilitiesMember Unit : USD
